ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] GU Comics - Daily OnLine Comic Strip by Woody  Hearn
ygData.msgSnippet: On Tue, 31 Oct 2000 20:44:54 +0100, (Allayana) ... Pleased to meet everyone.  I think I posted once before ages ago to this list, but otherwise I don t post
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 31 Oct 2000 20:44:54 +0100, "(Allayana)"
<sarastro@...> wrote:

>Heya all,
>Well, me too was wondering about the lifelyness of this group! But finally I
>got soms mail.
>
>I am also new here, so I just want to say hello too.
>
>Safe huntings,
>Allayana

Pleased to meet everyone. I think I posted once before ages ago to
this list, but otherwise I don't post much. It is a lot quieter than
the bards list I belong to, but that's the most active of them all I
think. And not just because there's a lot of complaints right now
either!

Hope to hear more from everyone!

--
Melaniel, Wood Elf Bard (48) "Flirting is a girl's best friend"
Kalara, Enchanter (37) "LOADING, PLEASE WAIT ...."
Tura, Dark Elf Necromancer (10) "Jobantik, you really smell!"
